--- select_singer_with_select_in_from_and_as.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM (
  SELECT
    *
  FROM
    Singers
  WHERE
    SingerID = 1
) as S

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From: 11,
      Source: &ast.SubQueryTableExpr{
        Lparen: 16,
        Rparen: 77,
        Query: &ast.Select{
          Select: 20,
          Results: []ast.SelectItem{
            &ast.Star{
              Star: 31,
            },
          },
          From: &ast.From{
            From: 35,
            Source: &ast.TableName{
              Table: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 44,
                NameEnd: 51,
                Name: "Singers",
              },
            },
          },
          Where: &ast.Where{
            Where: 54,
            Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
              Op: "=",
              Left: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 64,
                NameEnd: 72,
                Name: "SingerID",
              },
              Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 75,
                ValueEnd: 76,
                Base: 10,
                Value: "1",
              },
            },
          },
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As: 79,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 82,
            NameEnd: 83,
            Name: "S",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE SingerID = 1) AS S
